name: @systemprompt/os
description: An operating system for autonomous agents that run locally, remember persistently, and act purposefully

scripts.build: npm run clean:artifacts && tsc && cp -r modules dist/
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json
scripts.clean:artifacts: find src tools modules -name '*.js' -o -name '*.js.map' -o -name '*.d.ts' -o -name '*.d.ts.map' | xargs rm -f
scripts.restart: npm run stop && npm run start
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:e2e
scripts.docker:clean: docker build -f Dockerfile.test -t systemprompt-test . && docker run --rm systemprompt-test
scripts.docker:test: docker run --rm systemprompt-os npm run test:all
scripts.docker:stop: docker stop systemprompt-os && docker rm systemprompt-os
scripts.docker:mcp:test: npm run docker:mcp:build && npm run docker:mcp:up && npm run test:e2e -- tests/e2e/mcp-server.test.ts && npm run docker:mcp:down
scripts.validate: npm run build && npm run test:all
scripts.validate:docker: npm run docker:clean && npm run docker:build && npm run docker:test
scripts.postinstall: echo 'Run "npm run build" to compile TypeScript'
